headline: Is It Time To Reassess eBay (EBAY) After The Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether eBay's share price still reflects good value, you are not alone. This article is built around answering that question clearly. eBay closed at US$79.95, with returns of 16.3% over 1 year and 76.8% over 3 years, even though the stock has seen a 8.6% decline over the last 7 days and a 14.1% decline over the last 30 days, with a 8.2% decline year to date. Recent coverage has focused on eBay's position as a long standing online marketplace and how it is handling...

Recent coverage has focused on eBay's position as a long standing online marketplace and how it is handling...

headline: Apple Decouples From Nasdaq as AI ‘Whack-a-Mole’ Grips Market
summary: Its correlation with the benchmark has been on the decline since May, when it reached 0.92, as Apple’s decision to mostly sit out the AI arms race has turned it into an outlier compared with many of its rivals.  A correlation of 1 means the two securities are moving in perfect unison, while a reading of -1 signals they are moving opposite each other.

content.title: Apple Decouples From Nasdaq as AI ‘Whack-a-Mole’ Grips Market
content.summary: Its correlation with the benchmark has been on the decline since May, when it reached 0.92, as Apple’s decision to mostly sit out the AI arms race has turned it into an outlier compared with many of its rivals.  A correlation of 1 means the two securities are moving in perfect unison, while a reading of -1 signals they are moving opposite each other.

headline: EBay: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.36 per share. The e-commerce company posted revenue of $2.97 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.88 billion.

content.title: EBay: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.36 per share. The e-commerce company posted revenue of $2.97 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Seven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.88 billion.

headline: EBay forecasts upbeat revenue, buys Depop to boost fashion presence
summary: EBay Inc forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates ‌on Wednesday and announced the ‌acquisition of fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for ​nearly $1.2 billion, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.  EBay expects first-quarter revenue in ⁠the range of $3 billion to $3.05 billion, compared with analysts' average estimate of $2.80 billion, ​according to ​data compiled ​by LSEG.  Depop has a "strong ‌momentum in the pre-loved fashion category" which will deepen eBay's reach with younger, fashion-forward consumers and expand its presence in one of the most dynamic ‌areas of resale, the ​company said.

content.title: EBay forecasts upbeat revenue, buys Depop to boost fashion presence
content.summary: EBay Inc forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates ‌on Wednesday and announced the ‌acquisition of fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for ​nearly $1.2 billion, sending its shares up 7% in extended trading.  EBay expects first-quarter revenue in ⁠the range of $3 billion to $3.05 billion, compared with analysts' average estimate of $2.80 billion, ​according to ​data compiled ​by LSEG.  Depop has a "strong ‌momentum in the pre-loved fashion category" which will deepen eBay's reach with younger, fashion-forward consumers and expand its presence in one of the most dynamic ‌areas of resale, the ​company said.

headline: eBay Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY), a global commerce leader that connects millions of buyers and sellers around the world, today reported financial results for its fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2025.

content.title: eBay Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
content.summary: eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY), a global commerce leader that connects millions of buyers and sellers around the world, today reported financial results for its fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2025.

headline: eBay to Acquire Depop from Etsy
summary: eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY), a global commerce leader that connects millions of buyers and sellers around the world, and Etsy, Inc. (NYSE: ETSY), the global marketplace for unique and creative goods, today jointly announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement under which eBay will acquire Depop, a leading C2C fashion marketplace with deep recommerce roots and a highly-engaged Gen Z and Millennial customer base, for approximately $1.2 billion in cash, subject to certain purchase price

content.title: eBay to Acquire Depop from Etsy
content.summary: eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY), a global commerce leader that connects millions of buyers and sellers around the world, and Etsy, Inc. (NYSE: ETSY), the global marketplace for unique and creative goods, today jointly announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement under which eBay will acquire Depop, a leading C2C fashion marketplace with deep recommerce roots and a highly-engaged Gen Z and Millennial customer base, for approximately $1.2 billion in cash, subject to certain purchase price

headline: Online seller eBay to buy second hand fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for $1.2B in cash
summary: Online seller eBay wants a bigger share of the Gen Z market.  The online seller has agreed to purchase second hand fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for about $1.2 billion in cash, the companies said Wednesday.  In a statement, eBay's CEO Jamie Ianonne said that the acquisition is an opportunity to capture a younger demographic.

content.title: Online seller eBay to buy second hand fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for $1.2B in cash
content.summary: Online seller eBay wants a bigger share of the Gen Z market.  The online seller has agreed to purchase second hand fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for about $1.2 billion in cash, the companies said Wednesday.  In a statement, eBay's CEO Jamie Ianonne said that the acquisition is an opportunity to capture a younger demographic.

headline: EBay's $1.2 Billion Bid for Younger Shoppers
summary: EBay adds Depop, a secondhand-fashion app popular with younger consumers, to its core marketplace business, in a deal with Etsy, which had acquired Depop in 2021 for $1.63 billion. Shares of both companies rose after the bell.

content.title: EBay's $1.2 Billion Bid for Younger Shoppers
content.summary: EBay adds Depop, a secondhand-fashion app popular with younger consumers, to its core marketplace business, in a deal with Etsy, which had acquired Depop in 2021 for $1.63 billion. Shares of both companies rose after the bell.

headline: EBay to Acquire Depop for $1.2 Billion
summary: The acquisition represents an opportunity for the global marketplace to accelerate growth in secondhand fashion and draw a younger audience.

content.title: EBay to Acquire Depop for $1.2 Billion
content.summary: The acquisition represents an opportunity for the global marketplace to accelerate growth in secondhand fashion and draw a younger audience.

headline: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B
summary: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during the pandemic.

content.title: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B
content.summary: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during the pandemic.

headline: eBay to Buy Depop, the Used Clothing Site Favored by Gen Z, for $1.2 Billion
summary: Global commerce site  eBay  plans to buy Depop, the secondhand clothing sales platform favored by Gen Z for its “pre-loved fashion,” from online marketplace  Etsy  for $1.2 billion in cash.  Shares of eBay rose 6.7% to $87.70 in late Wednesday trading after the announcement, while Etsy shares jumped 14.8%.  London-based Depop is a platform where “highly engaged” Gen Z and Millennial customers buy and sell secondhand clothes, the companies said.

content.title: eBay to Buy Depop, the Used Clothing Site Favored by Gen Z, for $1.2 Billion
content.summary: Global commerce site  eBay  plans to buy Depop, the secondhand clothing sales platform favored by Gen Z for its “pre-loved fashion,” from online marketplace  Etsy  for $1.2 billion in cash.  Shares of eBay rose 6.7% to $87.70 in late Wednesday trading after the announcement, while Etsy shares jumped 14.8%.  London-based Depop is a platform where “highly engaged” Gen Z and Millennial customers buy and sell secondhand clothes, the companies said.

summary: eBay (EBAY) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +3.97% and +2.98%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: eBay shares jump as Q4 earnings beat, Depop acquisition announced
summary: Investing.com -- eBay Inc (NASDAQ:EBAY) shares jumped 7.1% in after-hours trading Wednesday after the e-commerce giant reported better-than-expected fourth quarter results, issued strong guidance, and announced plans to acquire fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for $1.2 billion.

content.title: eBay shares jump as Q4 earnings beat, Depop acquisition announced
content.summary: Investing.com -- eBay Inc (NASDAQ:EBAY) shares jumped 7.1% in after-hours trading Wednesday after the e-commerce giant reported better-than-expected fourth quarter results, issued strong guidance, and announced plans to acquire fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy for $1.2 billion.

headline: eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) Reports Strong Q4 CY2025, Stock Soars
summary: Online marketplace eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 15% year on year to $2.97 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($3.03 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8.5% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.41 per share was 4.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) Reports Strong Q4 CY2025, Stock Soars
content.summary: Online marketplace eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 15% year on year to $2.97 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($3.03 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8.5% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.41 per share was 4.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: EBay Buys Fashion Marketplace Depop, Reports Robust Results
summary: EBay is acquiring the secondhand marketplace from Etsy Inc., which bought Depop in 2021 for $1.6 billion.  Depop, which eBay plans to continue to operate as a separate brand, has about 7 million buyers, 90% of whom are younger than 34, Chief Executive Officer Jamie Iannone said Wednesday in an interview.

content.title: EBay Buys Fashion Marketplace Depop, Reports Robust Results
content.summary: EBay is acquiring the secondhand marketplace from Etsy Inc., which bought Depop in 2021 for $1.6 billion.  Depop, which eBay plans to continue to operate as a separate brand, has about 7 million buyers, 90% of whom are younger than 34, Chief Executive Officer Jamie Iannone said Wednesday in an interview.

headline: Occidental earnings, FOMC minutes, housing data: What to Watch
summary: Asking for a Trend Host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Wednesday, February 18, including Carvana (CVNA), Occidental Petroleum (OXY), and Booking Holdings (BKNG); the minutes from the Federal Reserve's January FOMC meeting; and the latest data on US housing starts and building permits. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: EBay shares jump amid fourth-quarter earnings beat, Depop acquisition
summary: Investing.com - EBay shares surged by almost 8% in premarket U.S. trading Thursday after the e-commerce giant reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter results, issued strong guidance, and announced plans to acquire fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy.

content.title: EBay shares jump amid fourth-quarter earnings beat, Depop acquisition
content.summary: Investing.com - EBay shares surged by almost 8% in premarket U.S. trading Thursday after the e-commerce giant reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter results, issued strong guidance, and announced plans to acquire fashion marketplace Depop from Etsy.
